This is where the dialog will go.. but I'm not sure how much will fit and how to handle overflow when it happens. Four lines per page seems like a reasonable amount. But how to handle the pages?

Before you adventure out into the world, you should meet with Luke. You can find him in the Tavern northwest of here. It's a big brick building, you can't miss it! I'm sure he will have some good advice to help you along on your journey.
